metadata.name: ...to Hope.
metadata.description:
Everyday is not a silver lining. Deep in notches and curves something stays consistent. 
Rage exists. 
Darkness exists. 
Doubts exist. 
Fear exists. 
Thoughts which try to pull you backwards exist.


However, HOPE … is what makes you put a hand on your heart and gives you the courage to move ahead towards the light … 
to new beginnings … 
to the future … 
to further and beyond ...  
.
.
.
.

The artwork is created using a self photograph taken a year back and is a reflection of that very phase of my life.


Image : 6000 X 9000 pixels @ 600ppi.
